{{Transcribed: '''''arth''''' is a noun meaning "noble, lofty, exalted" in [[Sindarin]]. Compare with ''[[arta]]'' in [[Quenya]].
* ''[[The Languages of Tolkien's Middle-earth]]'' by [[Ruth S. Noel]]
